amendment.description: To modify the notice and wait period applicable to modifications of certain contracts for national defense purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4771 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4771 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S8590-8591; text: CR S8590-8591) To modify the notice and wait period applicable to modifications of certain contracts for national defense purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4771 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4771 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Frist.
